paragraph.englishStoryPrompt: yamamotosan walks to work in shibuya prefecture everyday, but today he was running late so took the 615 train from Xstation. when he was going dwn the stairs to the sublevel to get to the train, he saw that he shoes were untied but also saw that train arriving. he had to make a choice lol and took off his shoe (so he wouldnt trip) and ran for the train.
paragraph.localizedOutlineEn: Yamamoto lives in Shibuya and usually walks to work every morning. One day he is late, so he decides to take the 6:15 train from Shibuya Station. While going down the stairs he notices his shoe is untied but also sees the train arriving, so he must quickly choose what to do.
paragraph.ja: 山本さんは毎日渋谷で会社まで歩いて行きます。でも今日は遅くなったので、６時１５分の電車に乗ろうと思いました。階段を下りているとき、くつのひもがほどけているのに気づきましたが、電車も来るのが見えました。「走れ！」と思って、転ばないようにくつをぬいで、電車に乗ることができました。
paragraph.en: Mr. Yamamoto walks to his company in Shibuya every day. But today he was late, so he decided to try to get on the 6:15 train. While he was going down the stairs, he noticed his shoelace was untied, but he also saw the train arriving. He thought, “Run!” and so he took off his shoe so he wouldn’t trip, and he was able to get on the train.
